text: Jiangxi Ganyue Expressway ( Simplified Chinese : 江西赣粤高速公路股份有限公司 ; traditional Chinese : 江西贛粵高速公路股份有限公司 ; pinyin : Jiangxi Gan-Yue gāosùgōnglù gǔfèn yǒuxiàngōngsī ; literally: "Anonymous Motorway Company of Guangdong - Jiangxi") is a Chinese company specialising in the construction, operation and maintenance of motorways. ==References== Category:Construction and civil engineering companies of China Category:Companies listed on the Shanghai Stock Exchange
title: Jiangxi Ganyue Expressway
